Analyzing the social dynamics of the 2020 New York and Milan Fashion Weeks.

Which brands do these international communities engage with?

  • What are the most successful brands in both Fashion Weeks?
  • What makes a fashion show successful?
  • Where is FW being talked about?
  • Which International communities are engaging with FW?
  • Which brands do these international communities engage with?
  • What are the major communities interacting with brands?
  • Which brands share the most users and how are the communities shaped?
  • Which are the main topics discussed with each brand?

Knowing that there is a global community for Fashion Week inspires us to analyze which Brands they are engaging with.This result will provide insights for Brands and users to explore the various audiences garnered by each of the two FW events.

Main Findings

From this we see which brands were popular amongst the common languages. We see that Prada and Gucci are the two brands that appear in all of the top languages, and most of the tweets for Prada and Coach were driven by Thai users.
